notes: Keep Delegated Duties as Clear that You Can If you are likely to delegate your tasks at workplace don't be vague. Continually be very particular about what each of the assigned jobs is meant to accomplish, who'll be given to it, in what time frame it must be done, and what other jobs will appear upon delivery of the first work.
